"wir sollten unsere personenbezogenen informationen schützen,because das internet ist voller unknown user,who want to steal our data und sell it an advertiser. #datenschutz #privatsphäre #security"

(translation: "we should protect our personal information because the internet is full of unknown users who want to steal our data and sell it to advertisers. #dataprivacy #privatesphere #security")
